name: fraggenescan

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
FragGeneScan is an application for finding (fragmented) genes in short
reads. It can also be applied to predict prokaryotic genes in incomplete
assemblies or complete genomes.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependent_to.name: isescan
dependent_to.description:
A python pipeline to identify IS (Insertion Sequence) elements in genome
and metagenome
